trailingComments.value:
*
 * Returns lighter color from the provieded color (by provided percentage). Implementation mimics behavior of the
 * lighten() in SCSS language, so it can be used to substitute it.
 *
 * @param {String} color RGB color as a hexadecimal string
 * @param {Number} percent Percentage to lighten
 * @returns {String} RGB color

value.raw: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(
value.cooked: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(

*
 * Returns linear gradient style for provided base color.
 *
 * @param {String} color RGB color
 * @returns {Object} VueJS object suitable for the style binding

trailingComments.value:
*
 * Returns linear gradient overlay style for provided base color and image path.
 *
 * @param {String} color RGB color
 * @param {String} imagePath image path
 * @returns {Object} VueJS object suitable for the style binding

value.raw: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, rgba(
